summary: The module supplies a helper class that encapsulates common operations related to artificially matched layers (AML) within the MAPDL preâ€‘processor. It offers straightforward methods to query AML configuration settings and compute the geometric size parameters needed to define the layers in a simulation model.
business_intent: Enable users to quickly and correctly configure artificially matched layers in ANSYS MAPDL simulations, reducing setup complexity and improving the accuracy and performance of electromagnetic analyses.
